Question Number 6:

write the pluck function

console.log(pluck({a: 1, b: true}, ['a']));//{ a: 1};
console.log(pluck({a: 1, b: true, c: 42}, ['a' , 'c']));//{ a: 1, c: 42};
console.log(pluck({a: 1, b: true, c: 42}, ['a' , 'c', 'x']));//{ a: 1, c: 42};

please export you function at the end: module.exports = yourFunction
